build: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starry-flow.png} tip={Starry Flow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starry-leap.png} tip={Starry Leap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight.png} tip={Starlight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-i-antares.png} tip={Stellar I - Antares}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-movement.png} tip={Astral Movement}>

<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/celestial-alignment.png} tip={Celestial Alignment}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-force.png} tip={Astral Force}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-energy.png} tip={Astral Energy}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight-enhancement-i.png} tip={Starlight Enhancement I}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-magic-guard.png} tip={Astral Magic Guard}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/oort-wave.png} tip={Oort Wave}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-ii-algol.png} tip={Stellar II - Algol}>

<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-elements.png} tip={Astral Elements}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-invincibility.png} tip={Astral Invincibility}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight-enhancement-ii.png} tip={Starlight Enhancement II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-enhancement-i.png} tip={Stellar Enhancement I}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-iv-bellatrix.png} tip={Stellar IV - Bellatrix}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-v-fomalhaut.png} tip={Stellar V - Fomalhaut}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-iii-alchiba.png} tip={Stellar III - Alchiba}>

<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-assimilation.png } tip={Astral Assimilation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/astral-infinity.png} tip={Astral Infinity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/empowered-ray.png} tip={Empowered Ray}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/enhanced-boom.png} tip={Enhanced Boom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight-enhancement-iii.png} tip={Starlight Enhancement III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-enhancement-ii.png} tip={Stellar Enhancement II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/appear.png} tip={Appear}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/link.png} tip={Link}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-vii-vega.png} tip={Stellar VII - Vega}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-vi-izar.png} tip={Stellar VI - Izar}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-equalize.png} tip={Stellar Equalize}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-viii-sadalmelik.png} tip={Stellar VIII - Sadalmelik}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pulsing.png} tip={Pulsing}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking-enhance.png} tip={Stellar Marking - Enhance}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-marking-reinforce-duration.png} tip={Stellar Marking - Reinforce Duration}> Stellar Marking - Enhance and Reinforce Duration_<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/appear-enhance.png} tip={Appear - Enhance}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/appear-persist.png} tip={Appear - Persist}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/appear-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Appear - Cooldown Cutter}> Appear - Enhance, Persist and Cooldown Cutter_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-i-antares.png} tip={Stellar I - Antares and Ray (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-v-fomalhaut.png} tip={Stellar V - Fomalhaut and Pole (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-vi-izar.png} tip={Stellar VI - Izar, Stellar VII - Vega, and Link (4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-ix-canopus.png} tip={Stellar IX - Canopus (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-ii-algol.png} tip={Stellar II - Algol and Boom (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight.png} tip={Starlight (1st Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight.png} tip={Starlight (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-i-antares.png} tip={Stellar I - Antares and Ray (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-ii-algol.png} tip={Stellar II - Algol and Boom (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-v-fomalhaut.png} tip={Stellar V - Fomalhaut and Pole (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-vi-izar.png} tip={Stellar VI - Izar, Stellar VII - Vega, and Link (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-ix-canopus.png} tip={Stellar IX - Canopus (Hyper Skill)}>

credits: Skill Icons + Animations, Hyper Passive Build

primary.name: Return to Oort
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 600 sec.
primary.desc: When used, teleports to Oort, Sia's hometown
details: This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Sia storyline

primary.name: Starry Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20
primary.desc: While in the air, hold the Skill Key or the Jump Key to slowly float down
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF the Jump Key activation

primary.name: Stellar Marking
primary.shortDesc: When cast, Marking Skills will be recorded on the Stellagram. Once four skills are recorded on the Stellagram, the Constellation Skill that corresponds to the recorded combination will be triggered
details: The order of the Marking Skills recorded does not matter

primary.name: Stellar Equalize
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 2400 sec, Attack Power & Magic ATT: +4%\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Ray
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 4, Records Ray on the Stellagram
primary.desc: Fires a lance of starlight forward
details: When used, skill is recorded on the Stellagram
Pressing the Skill Key and Down Arrow Key together will reset the Stellagram record

primary.name: Stellar I - Antares
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, Summons a rabbit hole that periodically deals 160% collision damage 3 times to up to 6 enemies for 5 sec., Max Summons: 4\nRabbit holes recharge every 10 sec., and you can have up to 4\n[Stellargram Fusion] Rabbit Hole Duration: +5 sec.
primary.desc: Summon a rabbit hole that periodically pulls in and damages enemies within
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}><bp_Grants increased summon duration_>
Up to 4 rabbit holes can be active at a time
Skill can hold up to 4 rabbit holes and recharges every 10 sec
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Starlight
primary.shortDesc: Upon attacking or activating a Constellation Skill, deals 90% damage 2 times and releases a travelling ray of starlight up to 3 times\nThe ray of starlight attacks until it disappears or reaches the max number of attacks. When the starlight disappears, it attacks an enemy that was previously aattacked an additional 1 times
primary.desc: While toggled, using the Attack Key or Constellation Skill releases a damaging ray that bounces to nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Starry Flow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport Horizontal Range: 190, Teleport Vertical Range: 275
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Starry Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air

primary.name: Astral Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -20%, 85% of damage taken goes to MP instead, Defense: +100
primary.desc: Reduces damage taken and a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: Additionally increases DEF
Excludes attacks that deal %Max HP damage
Will not work if you have 0 MP

primary.name: Astral Movement
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +20, Speed: +22, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +20

primary.name: Boom
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 3, Records Boom on the Stellagram
primary.desc: Explodes starlight in the surrounding area
details: When used, skill is recorded on the Stellagram

primary.name: Stellar II - Algol
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Summons Algol as a lizard that deals 210% damage to up to 8 enemies 4 times for 10 sec.\n[Stellagram Fusion] Lizard Duration: +10 sec\nCooldown: 20 sec.
primary.desc: Summons a lizard that periodically charges towards nearby enemies
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}><bp_Grants increased summon duration_>
Targets bosses with the highest Max HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Celestial Alignment
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 80 sec, Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Oort Wave
primary.shortDesc: INT: +20, Damage: +15%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Starlight Enhancement I
primary.shortDesc: Starlight Damage: +100% points
details: Increases %Damage of attack by a flat amount
Also applies to attack triggered by <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-iv-bellatrix.png} tip={Stellar IV - Bellatrix (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Astral Energy
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +50%, Magic ATT: +30, INT: +20, Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Astral Force
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +30%\nMP Absorb Chance: 30%, Amount Absorbed: 5% of Max MP, Amount Absorbed: 3% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Increases %Max MP and your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Pole
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Summons starlight that deals 520% damage to up to 5 enemies 3 times for 3 sec., Records Pole on the Stellagram\nCooldown: 5 sec.
primary.desc: Place down a starlight that damages within it
details: When used, skill is recorded on the Stellagram

primary.name: Stellar III - Alchiba
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Duration: 30 sec., Ignore Defense: +30%\n[Stellagram Fusion] Magic ATT: +30\nCooldown: 60 sec.
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}><bp_Grants Magic ATT_>

primary.name: Stellar IV - Bellatrix
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 90, Duration: 30 sec., Damage: +10%, Activates Starlight Link at set intervals
primary.desc: Increases %Damage and periodically activates <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight.png} tip={Starlight (1st Job)}>
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}><bp_Grants an extra hit with triggered <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starlight.png} tip={Starlight (1st Job)}>_>

primary.name: Stellar V - Fomalhaut
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 90, Duration: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 410%, Number of Attacks: 4, Horned Conches Created: 4
[Stellagram Fusion] Upon attacking, summons 4 Horned Conches that automatically pursue and attack nearby enemies.
Conches deal 410% damaage 2 times until the max number of attacks is reached or they disappear
Attacks up to 2 times, then disappears in 10 sec.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Summon horned conches that spin around you and damages nearby enemies
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}><bp_Creates additional horned conches that seek out and damage enemies_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Starry Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Horizontal Teleport Distance: +65, Vertical: +25
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the teleport distance of <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/starry-flow.png} tip={Starry Flow (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Stellar Enhancement I
primary.shortDesc:
Final Damage: +25%
Ray - Enemies Hit: +1, Number of Attacks: +2, Damage: +200% points
Boom - Enemies Hit: +2, Number of Attacks: +1, Damage: +150% points
Stellar I - Antares Damage: +250% points
Stellar II - Algol Damage: +250% points
details: Permanently increases %Final Damage

Increases the Number of Attacks and Enemies Hit for the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}>

Increases %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-i-antares.png} tip={Stellar I - Antares (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-ii-algol.png} tip={Stellar II - Algol (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Starlight Enhancement II
primary.shortDesc: Starlight Damage: +200% points
details: Increases %Damage of attack by a flat amount
Also applies to attack triggered by <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/stellar-iv-bellatrix.png} tip={Stellar IV - Bellatrix (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Astral Elements
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +10%, Critical Rate: +10%, Critical Damage: +10%

primary.name: Astral Invincibility
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistaance: +40%, Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Link
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Restores 10% of Max HP, Records Link on the Stellagraam\nCooldown: 10 sec.
primary.desc: When used, restores %Max HP
details: When used, skill is recorded on the Stellagram

primary.name: Stellar VI - Izar
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, Blade Created: 3
Each blade deals 470% damage 3 times and disappear when they reach their maximum attack count
Attacks up to 8 times, then disappears
[Stellagram Fusion] +2 blade(s)
Cooldown: 40 sec
primary.desc: Create blades that seek out and damage nearby enemies
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/link.png} tip={Link (4th Job)}><bp_Creates additional blades_>
Targets bosses with the highest Max HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Stellar VII - Vega
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 100, Unleashes a Starlit Gust that deals 700% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times
Also grants the Starlight Wings buff, which deals 700% damage to up to 5 enemies 3 times at set intervals for 8 sec.
[Stellagram Fusion] Starlight Wings Buff Duration: +6 sec.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Release a gust that damages nearby enemies and grants the buff "Starlight Wings"
details: [Starlight Wings]: Surrounds the character with a damaging zone

[Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/link.png} tip={Link (4th Job)}><bp_Increases duration of Starlight Wings buff_>

MP Cost: 40, Invincible for 2 sec. after caasting
Damage taken is reduced by 20% for 12 sec., including proportional to max HP

Cooldown: 90 sec.

primary.name: Stellar Enhancement II
primary.shortDesc:
Final Damage: +35%
Ray - Enemies Hit: +1, Number of Attacks: +2, Damage: +70% points
Boom - Enemies Hit: +2, Number of Attacks: +1, Damage: +30% points
Pole - Enemies Hit: +1, Number of Attacks: +1, Damage: +100% points
Stellar I - Antares Damage: +470% points
Stellar II - Algol Damage: +420% points
Stellar V - Fomalhaut Damage: +370% points

Increases the Number of Attacks and Enemies Hit for the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}>

fifthMain.name: Shine
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 400, Stellagram fusion effects will alwaays activate upon completing a Constellation Skill for 24 sec., Records Shine on the Stellagram\nCooldown: 60 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, all Constellation Skills used gain the Stellagram Fusion bonus effect
details: When used, skill is recorded on the Stellagram

fifthMain.name: Stellar XI - Sirius
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 600, Summons Sirius as a wolf that deals 870% damage to up to 15 enemies 10 times for 12 sec.
The wolf will howl before he disappears increasing Ignore Defense 10% for 10 sec.
[Stellagram Fusion] Grants the Howl buff while the wolf is active
Cooldown: 60 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons a stationary wolf that attacks nearby enemies and grants a buff when it disappears
details: [Buff]: Increases %Ignore DEF

[Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/ray.png} tip={Ray (1st Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/boom.png} tip={Boom (2nd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/pole.png} tip={Pole (3rd Job)}> - <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/shine.png} tip={Shine (5th Job)}><bp_Additionally grants buff while wolf is summoned_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Stellar XII - Sadalsuud
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 600, After 20 sec. or when used again after summoning, Max Enemies Hit: 9, Damage: 1025%, Number of Attacks: 15, Explosions: 10
RThe hourglass can be enhanced by attacking the enemy with a constellation skill, increasing Final Daamage by 100%
[Stellagram Fusion] Explosion Count: +4
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summons an hourglass that deals damage after a short period or when the Skill Key is pressed again
details: [Stellagram]: <tt src={/class-icons/shine/sia-astelle/shine.png} tip={Shine (5th Job)}><bp_Grants increased number of explosions_>
While summoned, the hourglass gains %Final Damage based on enemies attacked by Constellation Skills

meta: Sia is an INT mage class part of the Star Guardian. Sia utilize Celestial Light as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Sia can equip Compasses
